    • Method Detail

      • setFps

        @NotNull
public OnStepTrigger setFps(long fps)

        Sets the frames per second that the trigger activates. This has a maximum one step per second.

        Parameters:
        fps - the frames per second to set
        Returns:
        the trigger for method chaining

      • setDelay

        @NotNull
public OnStepTrigger setDelay(long delay)

        Sets the delay in seconds between the trigger activation. This has a minimum of one step every second. This will override setFps.

        Parameters:
        delay - The delay in seconds
        Returns:
        the trigger for method chaining
        See Also:
        setFps

        public void trigger(@NotNull
                    java.lang.Object[] args)
